1.content: The spy know as black widow look at a list of places of interest from her boss nick fury when her not busy with the avengers. Where does she goes?
1.title: the start of the missions.

15.content: Here are more ideas for the spy of shield to run into, near a vacation spot, in the ocean is a base, in a haunted house, in a abandoned boat shack.
15.title: other

info.brief_description: What can a top spy run into in her line of work?
info.description: The story goes that when most of the team is off that the black widow is send on different mission where she run into the tentacles. What happen is up to you!
info.pretty_title: Marvel black widow run into tentacles
